text: Israel Railway Museum () is the national trains museum of Israel. The museum is located in the east train station of Haifa. The station was established in 1892 by the Ottoman government for the Hejaz train to Mecca. It was the first train station in Palestine and the Land of Israel. In the station there is a Turkish monument for the train. == Other websites == *Israel Railways: About the Israel Railway Museum *ilMuseums.com: Israel Railway Museum Category:Museums in Haifa
title: Israel Railway Museum
